snippet: Baseball considers itself the most thoughtful of games. Yet the primary term used to explain the art of pitching is an inelegant word of ill-defined mush.
abstract: Inelegant and imprecise word 'stuff' is often used to describe force behind successful pitching in baseball, element that often determines who wins or loses game; even seasoned baseball commentators, however, find themselves at loss to describe 'stuff' in detail.
lead_paragraph: Baseball considers itself the most thoughtful of games. Yet the primary term used to explain the art of pitching is an inelegant word of ill-defined mush.

headline.main: The Mysteries of Pitching, and All That ‘Stuff’
headline.print_headline: Baseball Talk, and All That Stuff
